body_html: I empathize that you are super frustrated, but as a developer, you must know that we don't have unlimited time to support everything ourself. You are likely one of the few people that have tried to setup Windows/Java/GPUs together. As such we really would appreciate if you solve this problem and contribute it back to the community. I suspect that effort will save you time over writing your own framework.

body: I empathize that you are super frustrated, but as a developer, you must know that we don't have unlimited time to support everything ourself. You are likely one of the few people that have tried to setup Windows/Java/GPUs together. As such we really would appreciate if you solve this problem and contribute it back to the community. I suspect that effort will save you time over writing your own framework.
